text: A single cloud can weigh over 1 million pounds.
Your brain generates about 20 watts of power — enough to power a dim lightbulb.
The inventor of Pringles is buried in a Pringles can.
Dolphins can recognize themselves in mirrors.
Some turtles can breathe through their butts.
The human nose can detect over 1 trillion different scents.
A cubic inch of bone can bear a load of 19,000 pounds.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 to 45 minutes.
The inventor of the frisbee was cremated and made into frisbees.
Octopuses can taste with their tentacles.
Hot water freezes faster than cold water — the Mpemba effect.
There's a species of shark that can live for over 400 years.
Peanuts are not actually nuts — they're legumes.
The longest word without vowels is 'rhythms.'
Bees can recognize human faces.
A group of pandas is called an embarrassment.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
The moon has moonquakes.
A crocodile can't stick its tongue out.
Rats can laugh when tickled.
Almonds are related to peaches.
A blue whale's heart is the size of a small car.
Sharks can sense electricity from other animals.
The first oranges weren't orange — they were green.
A newborn kangaroo is about the size of a lima bean.
The Eiffel Tower can grow 6 inches in summer due to heat expansion.
Honey is the only food that never spoils.
The average person produces enough saliva to fill two swimming pools in their lifetime.
Polar bear fur is actually transparent, not white.
Bananas are slightly radioactive.
A sneeze can travel at over 100 mph.
The human body contains about 0.2 mg of gold.
You lose about 4 kg of skin cells each year.
The world's largest desert is Antarctica.
The shortest sentence in English is 'Go.'
You can hear a blue whale's heartbeat from 2 miles away.
Fingernails grow about 4 times faster than toenails.
The human eye can distinguish about 10 million different colors.
Armadillos always give birth to identical quadruplets.
A snail can sleep for 3 years.
The human brain is 73% water.
Venus is the hottest planet despite not being closest to the Sun.
Scotland's national animal is the unicorn.
A flea can jump 350 times its body length.
Elephants are the only animals that can't jump.
The strongest muscle in the body is the jaw muscle.
The human skeleton is completely replaced every 10 years.
Chickens are the closest living relatives to T. rex.
A group of crows is called a murder.
There are more trees on Earth than stars in the Milky Way.
Oysters can change gender multiple times.
The average person walks about 100,000 miles in their lifetime.
Your nose and ears never stop growing.
The human body has about 60,000 miles of blood vessels.
A day on Mars is almost the same length as on Earth — 24 hours, 37 minutes.
Cats have over 20 vocalizations, including the meow.
Goats have rectangular pupils.
The loudest animal on Earth is the sperm whale.
The Mona Lisa has no eyebrows.
There's a species of jellyfish that is biologically immortal.
Strawberries aren't berries, but bananas are.
A group of owls is called a parliament.
Honey bees can recognize human faces.
The average cloud weighs 1.1 million pounds.
Sound travels about 4 times faster in water than in air.
A hummingbird's heart beats up to 1,260 times per minute.
The world's oldest piece of chewing gum is 9,000 years old.
Butterflies can see more colors than humans.
A shrimp's heart is in its head.
Only 5% of the ocean has been explored.
The Amazon produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
The human body has more bacteria than human cells.
Venus rotates so slowly that a day is longer than a year.
A single strand of spaghetti is called a spaghetto.
Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated.
The inventor of the microwave got the idea from a melted chocolate bar.
A bolt of lightning is 5 times hotter than the sun's surface.
Sharks have been around longer than trees.
The Great Wall of China is not visible from space without aid.
Hippos produce pink milk.
The unicorn is Scotland's national animal.
Crows can hold grudges against specific humans.
A group of hedgehogs is called a prickle.
You can hear a blue whale's heartbeat from 2 miles away.
Glass balls bounce higher than rubber balls.
Cleopatra lived closer to the Moon landing than to the building of the Great Pyramid.
Cows kill more people annually than sharks.
Octopuses have blue blood.
The moon is slowly moving away from Earth.
Spiders are more closely related to lobsters than to insects.
Some frogs can freeze solid and thaw back to life.
A group of porcupines is called a prickle.
The tongue is the strongest muscle in the human body relative to its size.
Humans share 50% of their DNA with bananas.
A single tree can absorb about 10 pounds of air pollution per year.
Koalas sleep up to 22 hours a day.
Lobsters taste with their feet.
The fingerprints of koalas are virtually indistinguishable from humans.
The Great Barrier Reef is the largest living structure on Earth.
An octopus has three hearts.
